Steps.Description: Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If it stays, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed sweep
Step 2b: If opponent switches into Flygon, switch to Excadrill Swords Dance + X.Speed sweep
Step 1: Use Stealth Rock
Step 2a: If it stays, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed sweep
Step 2b: If opponent switches into Gliscor, switch to Chandelure, then switch to Metagross and use Trick.
Step 2b.a: Switch to Chandelure and use Calm mind + X.Speed sweep
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2: Switch to Excadrill Swords Dance + X.Speed sweep
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If you get Black Sludge, use Stealth Rock then switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed sweep
Step 2b: If you get Choice Scarf, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed sweep
Step 2c: If you get Focus Sash, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed sweep
Step 2d: If you get Life Orb, switch to Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed sweep
Step 2e: If it switches out into Flygon, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed sweep
Step 2f: If it switches out into Gliscor, use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed sweep
Step 2g: If it switches out into Steelix, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then Swords Dance + X.Speed sweep
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If it uses Superpower, switch to Chandelure and use Flamethrower to kill it. Escavalier will come out next. Switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed sweep
Step 2b: If it uses X-Scissor, switch to Poliwrath X.Defend + X.Speed. Use an Energy Root/Hyper Potion then use Belly Drum and sweep.
Step 2c: If it switches out into Gliscor, use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2: Flygon will come, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed sweep
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If it uses Drill Run, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed sweep
Step 2b: If it uses Megahorn, switch to Chandelure and use Flamethrower to kill it
Step 2b.a: If Drapion is sent out, switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Then switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed sweep
Step 2b.b: If Flygon is sent out, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If it uses Bulldoze or it switches into Gliscor, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2b: If Flygon is sent out, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2: Switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock. Use 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2: Flygon will come, switch to Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If it uses Earthquake
Step 2a.a: And you get Leftovers, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock. Use 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2a.b: And you get Rocky Helmet, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock. Use 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2b: If it uses Scald, use Stealth Rock and then switch to Blissey. Switch to the second Metagross and use Trick
Step 2b.a: If it switches back to Gastrodon, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2b.b: If it switches to Flygon, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2c: If it switches to Flygon, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Stealth Rock and then switch to Blissey and use Trick
Step 2a: If it switches into Durant, switch into Chandelure Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2b: If it switches into Ferrothorn/Tyranitar, switch back to Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 1: Trick then switch to Chandelure and use Flamethrower to kill. It will send in Kabutops. Immediately switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If Flygon is sent out, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2b: If Gliscor is sent out, use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If it uses Crabhammer, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
Step 2a.a: If Sceptile comes out, switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Then switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2b: If Flygon is sent out, switch to Excadrill Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2c: If Steelix is sent out, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2: Switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If it uses Surf, use Stealth Rock then switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
Step 2b: If Flygon is sent out, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2c: If Steelix is sent out, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If it stays, use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2b: If Steelix is sent out, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If it uses Superpower, switch into Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2a.a: If Flygon is sent out, switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch in Excadrill Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2b: If it uses Bug Bite, use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2c: If Flygon is sent out, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2: Flygon will come, Switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If it stays, use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2b: If Flygon is sent out, switch to Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2: Switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If Flygon is sent out, switch to Excadrill Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2b: If Gliscor is sent out, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2: Steelix will come out, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 1: Switch into Blissey then switch back to Metagross and use Trick
Step 2a: If it switches out into Ferrothorn, switch to Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2b: If it switches out into Gliscor, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If it stays, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2a.a: If Kabutops comes in, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
Step 2b: If Flygon is sent out, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2: Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If it uses Hidden Power, switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches out into Rhyperior. Switch to Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2b: If it uses Spore, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Let it switch into Rhyperior
Step 2b.a: If it uses Earthquake, switch to Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2b.b: If it uses Stone Edge, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
Step 2c: If it switches into Hippowdon/Rhyperior, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If you get Chesto Berry, switch to Blissey and use Trick as it switches out into Rhyperior. Switch to Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2b: If you get Choice Scarf, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum
Step 2c: If it switches out into Rhyperior, switch to Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If it stays, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure Calm Mind
Step 2b: If it switches to Camerupt, switch into Chandelure Calm Mind
Step 2c: If it switches to Donphan, switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2c.a: If out comes Parasect while you set up, kill it. Parasect is sent out, so switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum
Step 2d: If it switches to Rhyperior
Step 2d.a: And you get Leftovers, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2d.a.a: If out comes Parasect while you set up, kill it. Parasect is sent out, so switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum
Step 2d.b: And you get Life Orb, switch into Chandelure Calm Mind
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2: Switch into Chandelure Calm Mind
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If it switches to Gliscor, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2b: If it switches out into Rhyperior, use Stealth Rock, then switch into Chandelure X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick then switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2a: If it switches into Blastoise, switch into Poliwrath Belly Drum
Step 2b: If it switches out into Parasect, use Iron Head to kill. Switch into Poliwrath Belly Drum
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If it uses Earthquake, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2b: If it uses Fire Punch, use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2c: If it switches out into Steelix, switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If you get Choice Band, use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure X.Speed
Step 2b: If you get Life Orb
Step 2b.a: And it uses Superpower, use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2b.a.a: If it switches out, switch into Chandelure then switch into the second Metagross and use Trick;
Step 2b.a.a.a: If it switched into Gliscor/Rhyperior, switch into Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2b.a.a.b: If it switched into Hippowdon, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + 2x X.Speed
Step 2b.b: And it uses X-Scissor, switch to Poliwrath X.Defend + Belly Drum + X.Speed
Step 2b.b.a: If Amoonngus comes out, use Ice Punch to kill. Switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind
Step 2b.b.b: If Rhyperior comes out, use Drain Punch until Cloyster comes out. Set up Belly Drum + X.Speed
Step 2c: If it switches out into Rhyperior, switch into Excadrill Stealth Rock, then switch into Chandelure X.Speed
Step 1: Switch into Chandelure then switch to Blissey and repeat. Switch to Chandelure then switch to Metagross and use Trick as it finally switches out into Gliscor
Step 2: Switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick then switch to Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed

Step 2: If it switches out into Amoonguss, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Let Rhyperior come in and use Protect, then switch back to Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed. Let Excadrill tank ROck Blast. Use Iron Head vs. Ginger.
Step 1: Switch to Blissey and use Stealth Rock. (USE IRON HEAD/SHADOW BALL VS. GINGER)
Step 2a: If it used Shadow Ball
Step 2a.a: And it uses Focus Blast, switch to Chandelure then switch to Blissey again and use Trick;
Step 2a.a.a: If you get Black Sludge and it locks Focus Blast, switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2a.a.b: If you get Life Orb and it locked Focus Blast, use Softboiled;
Step 2a.a.b.a: if you get a -1 SpDef debuff, immediately switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2a.a.b.b: If it switches into Durant, switch to Chandelure 2x X.Speed
Step 2a.a.b.c: If it switches into Rhyperior;
Step 2a.a.b.c.a: And you get Life Orb, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2a.a.b.c.b: And you get Passho Berry, switch to Chandelure and switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch back to Chandelure 2x X.Speed
Step 2a.a.b.c.c: And if anything else from above, switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2a.a.c: If it switches into Rhyperior, switch into Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step2.a.b: And it switches into Durant, switch to Chandelure 2x X.Speed
Step2.a.c: And it switches into Rhyperior, switch back to Excadrill then switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2b: If it used Will-O-Wisp, switch to Chandelure then switch back to Metagross and use Trick. Use Stealth Rock then switch back into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed. Use Shadow Ball vs. Ginger
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2: Switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If it stays, Excadrill Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure X.Speed
Step 2b: If it switches into Parasect, switch to Blissey and use Trick. Switch into Excadrill Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2: Switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1: Switch to Blissey, switch back to Metagross Trick. Use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If it uses Leech Life, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum
Step 2b: If it uses Leech Seed, use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure X.Speed
Step 2b.a: If it switches into Rhyperior, switch into Chandelure then switch into the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch into Chandelure Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1: Switch to Excadrill then switch to Blissey Trick as it switches out into Rhyperior.
Step 2a: If you get Leftovers, switch into Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2b: If you get Life Orb, switch to Chandelure Calm Mind
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If Focus Sash, switch into Excadrill Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2b: If Life Orb, Excadrill 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2c: If Leftovers, switch into Excadrill Stealth Rock then 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2c.a: Use Iron Head vs. Ginger
Step 2d: If Passho Berry, switch to switch into Excadrill Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure X.Speed
Step 2e: If Rocky Helmet, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If it stays, switch to Blissey Trick. Follow Rhyperior solve below.
Step 2b: If it switches to Hippowdon, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2c: If it switches to Rhyperior
Step 2c.a: And you get Life Orb, switch to Chandelure  Calm Mind
Step 2c.b: And you get Rocky Helmet, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2: Switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2: Switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock. Switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2: Switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If it stays, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2b: If it switches out into Seismitoad, switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick then switch into Chandelure Calm Mind
Step 2: If it switches to Rhyperior after using Calm Mind, switch to the second Metagross Trick then switch back into Chandelure Calm Mind
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If it uses Super Fang, use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2b: If it switches out, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2: Switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2: Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2a: If it switches out into Dragonite, switch to Metagross Trick then switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
Step 1: Switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1a: If it switches out into Dragonite, switch to Metagross Trick then switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If Choice Band, switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2b: If it stays and you get other items, switch to the second Metagross;
Step 2b.a: If it switches out into Rotom, switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2b.b: If it switches out into Salamence, use Trick then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2c: If it switches out into Ludicolo, use Stealth Rock;
Step 2c.a: If it uses Leech Seed, switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2c.a.a: If it switches out to Bronzong while you set up, Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2c.a.b: if it switches into Medicham, switch to Chandelure and use Shadow Ball to KO
Step 2c.a.b.a: If Lucidolo is sent out again, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
Step 2c.a.b.a.a: If it switches out to Bronzong while you set up, Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2c.a.b.b: If Houndoom is sent out, switch to Blissey Trick then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2c.b: If it uses Scald, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
Step 2c.b.a: If it switches out to Bronzong while you set up, Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2d: If it switches into Rotom-Heat/Salamence, switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1: Switch into Excadrill and use Stealth Rock. Switch into Blissey then switch into Chandelure. Switch back into Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If it uses Drain Punch, switch to Chandelure as Rotom comes out. Switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2b: If Rotom comes out, switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1: Switch to Chandelure then switch into Blissey and use Trick. Switch into Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 1a: If it switches into Bouffalant, switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If it uses Drain Punch, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2b: If it uses Payback, use Stealth Rock then switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
Step 2c: If it switches to Salamence, switch into Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If you get Expert Belt use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2a.a: If it switches out into Bouffalant, switch into Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2b: If you get Leftovers, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
Step 1: Trick then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1: Switch to Chandelure then switch to Metagross and use Stealth Rock. Switch to Blissey and use Trick, locking Sacred Fire. Switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1: Switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1: Trick then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed

Step 1: Switch to Blissey then switch to Metagross. Medicham will come out, so switch to Chandelure and use Shadow Ball. It will send out either Houndoom or Ludicolo. Switch back to Blissey and use Trick. Use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1: Trick then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If it uses High Jump Kick, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure X.Special + X.Speed
Step 2b: If it switches out to Steelix, switch into Excadrill Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1: Trick then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If it used Scald, use Stealth Rock then switch to Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum
Step 2a.a: If it switches into Bronzong, switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2b: If it used Leech Seed, use Stealth Rock;
Step 2b.a: If it switches out into Bronzong, switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2b.b: If it switches out into Medicham, switch into Chandelure and use Shadow Ball. Switch into Blissey and use Trick. Use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2b.c: If it switches out to Salamence, switch to the second Metagross Trick, then switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2c: If it switches out to Salamence, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2c.a: If it switches out into Ludicolo, switch into Blissey and use Trick;
Step2c.a.a: If it stays, switch into Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
Step2c.a.b: If it switches out into Conkeldurr, switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If it uses Energy Ball, use Stealth Rock then switch to Blissey. Switch to Metagross then switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2b: If it uses Drain Punch/Hidden Power, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2b.a: If it switches into Bouffalant, switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2b.b: If it switches into Dragonite, switch to Blissey then switch to Chandelure. Bouffalant comes out, so switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2c: If it uses Leech Seed, use Stealth Rock then switch into Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
Step 2c.a: If it switches out into Bronzong, switch to Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2c.b: If it switches out into Dragonite, switch to Chandelure then switch to Metagross Trick. Switch back to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2d: If it switches out into Dragonite, use Stealth Rock then switch into Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
Step 2e: If it switches out into Entei, switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2f: If it switches out into Salamence, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2g: If it switches out into Steelix, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2g.a: If it switches into Charizard, switch into  Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1: Switch to Chandelure then switch to Blissey
Step 2a: If it used Thunderbolt;
Step 2a.a: and it doesn’t have Life Orb
Step 2.a.a.a: and it stays, use Trick
Step 2.a.a.a.a: If it uses Cross Chop, switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2.a.a.a.b: If it uses Focus Blast, switch into Metagross and use Trick. Use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2.a.a.a.c: If it switches into Conkeldurr, use Stealth Rock then switch into Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2.a.a.a.c.a: If Blissey dies, add an X.Defend to Chandelure
Step 2.a.a.a.d: If it switches into Medicham;
Step 2.a.a.a.d.a: and it has Choice Scarf, switch into Metagross and use Trick. Use Stealth Rock then switch into Poliwrath X.Speed + Belly Drum
Step 2.a.a.a.d.a.a: If it switches out into Bronzong, switch into Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2.a.a.a.d.b: and it has Life Orb, use Stealth Rock then switch into Metagross and use Trick. Switch back into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2.a.a.a.e: and it switches into Dragonite, use Stealth Rock. Switch back to Chandelure and switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch once again to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2.a.a.b: and it has Life Orb, use Trick;
Step 2.a.a.b.a: If it stays, switch to Metagross;
Step 2.a.a.b.a.a: If it switches into Arcanine, use Trick then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2.a.a.b.a.b: If it switches into Blaziken, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2.a.a.b.a.c: If it switches into Haxorus/Infernape, use Trick then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2.a.a.b.b: If it switches into Arcanine/Blaziken, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2.a.a.b.c: If it switches into Haxorus/Infernape, switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2b: If it switches into Bronzong, switch to Metagross and use Trick
Step 2b.a: If it stays, switch into Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
Step 2b.a.a: If it switches into Rotom, switch to Excadrill Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2b.b: If it switches into Rotom, switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2c: If it switches into Dragonite, switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch into Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
Step 1: Use Trick
Step 2a: If you get Choice Scarf;
Step 2a.a: and it uses Thunder Punch, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed

Step 2a.b: and it uses other moves, switch to Chandelure and use Shadow Ball. Out comes Houndoom/Ludicolo, so switch to Blissey Trick and use Stealth Rock. Switch back to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2b: If you get Life Orb, switch to Chandelure and use Shadow Ball. Out comes Magmortar, so switch to Blissey Trick and use Stealth Rock. Switch back to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed

Step 1: Switch to Blissey then switch to Metagross. Switch to Chandelure and use Shadow Ball to KO Medicham. Out comes Houndoom/Ludicolo, so switch to Blissey Trick and use Stealth Rock. Switch back to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.

Step 1: Switch to Chandelure then switch to Metagross and use Earthquake. Out comes Salamence/Steelix, so switch to Chandelure then switch back to Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed.
Step 1a: If it switches out into Ludicolo, switch to Blissey Trick. Then switch back once more into Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Step 1: Switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed

Step 1: If it’s Intimidate, switch to Blissey Stealth Rock. Switch to Metagross and switch to Chandelure and do this twice. Switch back to Metagross and use Trick, then switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Step 2: If it’s Moxie, use Trick
Step 2a: If it uses Fire Blast, switch back to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed.
Step 2b: If it uses Earthquake, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2b.a: If it switches out into Ludicolo, switch to Blissey Trick. Switch back to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed

Step 2b: If you get Rocky Helmet, switch to Excadrill Stealth Rock then 3x Swords Dance + X.Speed

Step 2c: If it switches into Charizard, switch into Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 2d: If it switches into Dragonite, switch into Blissey then switch into Chandelure. Switch into Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed

Step 1: Use Trick
Step 1a: If it uses Flamethrower, switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1b: If it uses Will-0-Wisp, Stealth Rock;
Step 1b.a: If it stays, switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1b.b: If it switches out, switch to the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed

Step 1d: If you get Choice Scarf, switch to Chandelure 4x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1e: If you get Leftovers/Life Orb, switch to Chandelure 5x Calm Mind + X.Speed

Step 1f: If it switches out into Bronzong, use Stealth Rock as it switches out into Slowbro. Use Stealth Rock again to see what it does;

Step 1f.b: If it uses Scald, switch into Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
Step 1g: If it switches out into Dragonite
Step 1g.a: and you get Dragon Fang, use Stealth Rock then switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1g.b: and you get Leftovers, switch to Poliwrath Belly Drum + X.Speed
Step 1h: If it switches out into Hydreigon;
Step 1h.a: and you get Choice Scarf, switch to Blissey and use Stealth Rock. Then switch to Metagross and use Trick. Switch to Chandelure 2x Calm Mind + X.Speed
Step 1h.b: and you get Life Orb, switch to Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed

Step 2b.b: If it sends out Chandelure, let it die then send in the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch into your own Chandelure 3x Calm Mind + X.Speed

Step 2b.c.a: If it gets damaged by Life Orb, send in the second Metagross and use Trick. Switch into  Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
Step 2b.c.b: If it didn’t get damaged, switch into Excadrill 2x Swords Dance + X.Speed
